Generated by DocFX

Class UserProfileService

Provides services for managing user profiles, including operations such as retrieving and setting user pronouns, zodiac information, biographies, and privacy settings. It interacts with external services for some functionalities, like fetching pronouns from PronounDB.

GetProfileEmbed(IUser, IUser)

Asynchronously generates an embed for displaying a user's profile information.

Declaration
public Task<Embed?> GetProfileEmbed(IUser user, IUser profileCaller)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IUser user

The user to generate the profile embed for.
IUser profileCaller

The user requesting the profile view, for privacy considerations.
Returns
Type Description
Task<Embed>

An Discord.Embed object containing the user's profile information, or null if privacy settings prevent displaying it.
Remarks

The profile embed includes information such as pronouns, zodiac sign, birthday, and other personalization settings, considering the privacy settings.

GetPronounsOrUnspecifiedAsync(ulong)

Asynchronously retrieves the pronouns for a given Discord user ID, either from the local database or PronounDB if unspecified.

Declaration
public Task<PronounSearchResult> GetPronounsOrUnspecifiedAsync(ulong discordId)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong discordId

The Discord user ID to retrieve pronouns for.
Returns
Type Description
Task<PronounSearchResult>

A PronounSearchResult object containing the pronouns or a default value if unspecified.
Remarks

This method first attempts to find the user's pronouns in the local database. If not found or unspecified, it then queries PronounDB's API.

GetZodiacInfo(ulong)

Asynchronously fetches zodiac information for a given Discord user ID.

Declaration
public Task<(bool, ZodiacResult)> GetZodiacInfo(ulong discordId)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong discordId

The Discord user ID to retrieve zodiac information for.
Returns
Type Description
Task<(bool, ZodiacResult)>

A tuple containing a boolean indicating success, and a ZodiacResult object if successful.
Remarks

The zodiac information is retrieved from an external API and requires the user's zodiac sign to be previously set.

SetSwitchFc(IUser, string)

Asynchronously sets the Nintendo Switch friend code for a given user.

Declaration
public Task<bool> SetSwitchFc(IUser user, string fc)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IUser user

The user to set the friend code for.
string fc

The friend code to set.
Returns
Type Description
Task<bool>

True if the friend code was successfully set; otherwise, false.
Remarks

Validates the friend code format before setting it. Friend codes must match the pattern "SW-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX".

Declaration

Parameters
Type Name Description
IUser user

The user to set the zodiac sign for.
string zodiacSign

The zodiac sign to set.
Returns
Type Description
Task<bool>

True if the zodiac sign was successfully set; otherwise, false.
Remarks

The method checks if the provided zodiac sign is within a predefined list of valid signs before setting it.
